articleContent:
Pioneer Association picked the Whisperwind Haven as the new theme for Wutherium Geographic magazine.
The Association has set up a special survey for the Whisperwind Haven.

✦Duration✦
2025-04-14 04:00 - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)

✦Rewards✦
Premium Enclosure Tank x30, Premium Sealed Tube x30, Premium Resonance Potion x10, Premium Energy Core x10, Shell Credit x300,000

✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 14.

✦Event Details✦
- Complete Survey Tasks daily to get Survey Points and claim rewards after meeting Survey Point requirements.
- Survey Tasks refresh every day at 04:00 (server time). Unclaimed Survey Points will be automatically claimed at this time.
- If you have any unclaimed rewards when the event ends, you can log in within 30 days afterward to receive these rewards via mail.
articleTitle: [Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event: Whisperwind Haven
